attributes.action: Decry the recent media payment for serving men and woman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make the servicemen/woman who sold their stories to the media put the money into a fund for the families of british service men and women killed in war and peace keeping service around the world.  Taking this money for telling their story leaves a bad taste in the mouths of other servicemen both serving and retired.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
